sn35.53:4.2: Atha kho aññataro bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn35.53:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.53:4.5: “kathaṃ nu kho, bhante, jānato kathaṃ passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti?
sn35.53:5.1: “Cakkhuṃ kho, bhikkhu, aniccato jānato passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn35.53:5.2: Rūpe aniccato jānato passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn35.53:5.5: yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn35.53:5.10: manaṃ aniccato jānato passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn35.53:5.14: yampidaṃ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃ vā tampi aniccato jānato passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjati.
sn35.53:5.15: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhu, jānato evaṃ passato avijjā pahīyati, vijjā uppajjatī”ti.
